title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for v'(t)=a(t)

1 point is earned for the explanation of x(8) > 30

Since v'(t)=a(t) > 0 for 0<t<8, v(t) ≥ 3 on this interval.

Therefore, x(8)=x(0)+ ∫ 0 8 v(t)dt≥7 +8.3>30. MathType@MTEF@5@5@@47DD@
